Extends ozpIwc.Participant

fetchPolicy

(
  • policyURI
)
AsyncAction

Provided by the bus module.

Defined in app/js/bus/security/prp.js:72

Fetches the requested policy and stores a copy of it in the cache. Returns a denyAll if policy is unobtainable.

Parameters:

  • policyURI String

    the uri to gather the policy from

Returns:

AsyncAction:

will resolve with the gathered policy constructed as an ozpIwc.policyAuth.Policy.

getAttributes(id)

(
  • [subjectId]
)
ozpIwc.AsyncAction

Provided by the bus module.

Defined in app/js/bus/security/pip.js:18

Returns an asyncAction that will resolve with the attributes stored at the given URN.

Parameters:

  • [subjectId] String optional

    – The authenticated identity to get attributes for.

Returns:

ozpIwc.AsyncAction:

– Resolves an object of the attributes of the subject.

Example:

URN "ozp:storage:myAttrs" may contain "ozp:iwc:loginTime" and "ozp:iwc:name". getAttributes("ozp:storage:myAttrs") would resolve with the following:

{
     'ozp:iwc:loginTime' : {
        'attributeValue': Array<Primative>
    },
     'ozp:iwc:name' : {
        'attributeValue': Array<Primative>
    }
}

getPolicy(policyURIs)

(
  • [policyURIs]
  • [combiningAlgorithm]
)
ozpIwc.AsyncAction

Provided by the bus module.

Defined in app/js/bus/security/prp.js:23

Gathers policies by their URN. These policies may need formatting by the formatPolicies function to gather any attribute data needed for the policy evaluation. If a policy cannot be found, it is labeled as a "denyAll" policy and placed in the cache. Thus, making any permission check using said policy always deny.

Parameters:

  • [policyURIs] String | Array optional

    The subject attributes or id performing the action.

  • [combiningAlgorithm] String optional

    Defaults to “deny-overrides”.

Returns:

ozpIwc.AsyncAction:

will resolve with an array of policy data.

grantAttributes(subjectId,attributes)

(
  • [subjectId]
  • [attributes]
)

Provided by the bus module.

Defined in app/js/bus/security/pip.js:63

Sets the desired attributes in the cache at the specified URN.

Parameters:

  • [subjectId] String optional

    – The recipient of attributes.

  • [attributes] Object optional

    – The attributes to grant (replacing previous values, if applicable)

grantParent(subjectId,parentSubjectId)

(
  • [subjectId]
  • [parentSubjectId]
)
ozpIwc.AsyncAction

Provided by the bus module.

Defined in app/js/bus/security/pip.js:78

Merges the attributes stored at the parentId urn into the given subject. All merge conflicts take the parent attribute. Will resolve with the subject when completed.

Parameters:

  • [subjectId] String optional

    – The recipient of attributes.

  • [parentSubjectId] String optional

    – The subject to inherit attributes from.

Returns:

ozpIwc.AsyncAction:

resolves with the subject and its granted attributes merged in.

defaultCombiningAlgorithm

String

Provided by the bus module.

Defined in app/js/bus/security/prp.js:62

The URN of the default combining algorithm to use when basing a decision on multiple rules in a policy.

Default: 'urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:3.0:rule-combining-algorithm:deny-overrides'
